title: The Community
body: the only reason I am writing this is because of the game I just had.I got flamed as support for saving the adc and the jg and top call me !#@$ even though the jungler spent the whole game top half. then the enemy kayle proceeds to call me and veigar !#@$ too and cusses at me about 50 times and insults me. and then poppy starts trolling by dancing with kayle. What has this game become rito

replies.body:
Mate... Riot or any company for that matter are not and will never be in control of how any person decides to behave. 

Sure they can punish said player; but ultimately they cannot force players to act a certain way...
Deal with it, or mute them. There is no other way in this game to not get flamed, or get a team of 5
